subject: Rental Approved - PDF Ticket Attached - City
content:
Excellent news! Your rental request for City has been approved!
Your rental ticket has been generated: TKT-20250902105212-6E94A4DD
A beautiful PDF ticket has been sent to your email with all the details.
IMPORTANT: Please save the PDF ticket. You will need it for vehicle pickup.
Pickup Instructions:
- Bring valid government-issued ID
- Present your PDF ticket (digital or printed copy)
- Arrive 15 minutes before rental start time
- Vehicle inspection will be conducted before handover
Check your email for the complete PDF ticket!
